title: LifeTree Chiropractic and Aromatherapy | LinkedIn
description: LifeTree Chiropractic and Aromatherapy | 25 followers on LinkedIn. LifeTree Chiropractic & Aromatherapy was opened by the husband & wife team of Dr. David & Eva Levin in the West Village of Manhattan, NY (Autumn 2009). After many years working as a Chiropractor and Clinical Aromatherapist in the US as well as in Europe our goal of opening our own office had been reached.
